column3: and we will call upon thy name~; we will relate thy wondrous works.

column1: 3 ^ When I shall take a time
4 ^ The earth is melted and all that dwell therein~; I have established the pillars thereof.

column3: and to the sinners, Lift not up the horn

column1: 6 ^ lift not up your horn on high~; speak not iniquity against God."
8 ^ For God is the judge. One he putteth down
9 ^ for in the hand of the Lord there is a cup of strong wine full of mixture
column2: and he hath poured it out from this to that
column3: but the dregs thereof are not emptied~; all the sinners of the earth shall drink.

column1: 10 ^ But I will declare for ever~; I will sing to the God of Jacob~;
11 ^ and I will break all the horns of sinners
column2: but the horns of the just shall be exalted.
